metadata.title: Thursday, 22nd September, 2022
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when the construction of the following infrastructure at the Ndeke Village Clinic in Kamfinsa Parliamentary Constituency will be completed:
(i) children’s wing; (iv) theatre; (ii) maternity wing; (v) surgery room; and (iii) mortuary; (vi) x-ray room; and
(b) what the cost of the outstanding works is.
(a) when the following Schools in Sioma District will be electrified:
(i) Mashika Primary; (vii) Nalwashi Primary; (ii) Matebele Primary; (viii) Mbopuma Primary; (iii) Sitoti Primary; (ix) Kalongola Secondary; (iv) Mbume Primary; (x) Mulele Secondary; and
(v) Silowana Likondwama Primary; (xi) Mutomena Secondary; and (vi) Naliyo Primary;
(b) what the cause of the delay in electrifying the Schools is.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct houses for police officers in Chasefu District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented;
(c) if there are no such plans, why;
(d) whether the Government has any plans to construct police posts in the following areas:
(i) Nkanga; (iv) Egichickeni; and (ii) Khulamayembe; (v) Kamzoole; (iii) Mthwalo
(e) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and

(f) if there are no such plans, why. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Thanks – His Excellency the President’s Address - Motion (13th September) -Resumption of Debate: (Mr Chinkuli, MP). ____________________________
